definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Second, are female-headed households over-represented among the poor?
sentences.chinese: 第二，女性戶主家庭是否有更高的貧困發生率。

sentences.english: In 1995, the first owner of the house was a catfish lover.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，這個房子的第一個戶主很喜歡喫鮎魚。

sentences.english: The other thing the clients were hoping for was an upstairs laundry.
sentences.chinese: 戶主的另外一個要求就是樓上要有一個洗衣房。

sentences.english: Although some homebuilders are heavily indebted, households are not.
sentences.chinese: 雖然一些建築商負債累累，但房屋戶主們並沒有。

sentences.english: Every homeowner must agree for the deal to go through.
sentences.chinese: 每家戶主都必須同意協議接受審查。

sentences.english: Excuse me, have you brought the host's Household Register?
sentences.chinese: 請問戶主的戶口簿帶來了沒有？

sentences.english: The clients for this project were a young family with a very modern aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 這次的戶主是一個年輕的家庭，審美觀非常現代。

sentences.english: It's this middle-age couple and their teenage son whose in a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 戶主是對中年夫婦，他們十幾歲的兒子坐着輪椅。

sentences.english: Can I speak to the householder .
sentences.chinese: 我可以請戶主聽電話嗎？

sentences.english: Can you tell me what is the relationship between you and the owner of the bankbook?
sentences.chinese: 您能告訴我您和這個存摺的戶主是什麼關係嗎？

sentences.english: Firms and householders are overburdened with debts, some of which are indexed to inflation.
sentences.chinese: 公司和戶主負債累累，其中一些債務預示着通貨膨脹。

definition: to set on fire/to commit arson
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
